long_description: When the day heats up, the Pepper's Parker Polarized Sunglasses step in to keep your eyes shielded from harmful UV rays. Triacetate polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Shatterproof lenses provide 100% UV protection. Tortoise frames feature brown lenses that block reflected glare while delivering contrast in bright light. Black frames feature gray lenses for neutral-tinted protection in bright, sunny conditions. Acetate frames are engineered for light weight and durability. Closeout.
short_description: When the day heats up, the Pepper's Parker Polarized Sunglasses step in to keep your eyes shielded from harmful UV rays.
